head: alarm systems
pain: A system that ensures your safety in your absence
content: Autonomous security alarm systems for small private and business facilities
Options for the implementation of the security alarm system
Integrated security systems, hardware and software systems
details: They provide for the control of premises for unauthorized entry and signaling of this event to the owner of the facility or to the security point
We install wired and wireless security alarm systems
integration of various systems into a single structure for displaying and responding to events and managing systems based on situational platforms
